source.3a44d295:
#transform amount in USD column
df['Amount in USD'] = [float(str(i).replace('$', '').replace('-', '')) for i in df['Amount in USD']]
df['Amount in USD'] = df['Amount in USD'].astype(int)
df['Amount in USD'].dtypes
source.110af606:
#visualize outlier
df.boxplot(column = 'Amount in USD')
print('Maximum of amount :', df['Amount in USD'].max())
print('Minimum of amount :', df['Amount in USD'].min())
print('Median of amount :', df['Amount in USD'].median())
print('Average of amount :', df['Amount in USD'].mean())
print('Total of amount :', df['Amount in USD'].sum())

source.b7801378:
#analyze total amount of fund cash based on transfer quarter and fund name
total_transfer_quarter_fund_name = pd.pivot_table(df, index = ['Fund Name', 'Transfer Quarter'], values = 'Amount in USD', 
                                            aggfunc = {'Amount in USD' : np.sum}).sort_values('Amount in USD', 
                                                                                               ascending = False)
total_transfer_quarter_fund_name.head(20)
source.391480cc:
#analyze total amount of fund cash based on as of date and calendar year
pd.pivot_table(df, index = ['As of Date', 'Calendar Year'], values = 'Amount in USD',
               aggfunc = {'Amount in USD' : np.sum}).sort_values('Amount in USD', ascending = False)

total_principal_recipient_sector = pd.pivot_table(df, index = ['Sector/Theme', 'Principal Recipient'], values = 'Amount in USD', 
                                                  aggfunc = {'Amount in USD' : np.sum}).sort_values('Amount in USD',
                                                                                                    ascending = False)
total_principal_recipient_sector.head(20)
source.33c7b18b:
#visualize number of transfer quarter
plt.figure(figsize = (8,6))
transfer_quarter = [np.count_nonzero(df['Transfer Quarter'] == 'OCT-DEC'),
                   np.count_nonzero(df['Transfer Quarter'] == 'APR-JUN'),
                   np.count_nonzero(df['Transfer Quarter'] == 'JUL-SEP'),
                   np.count_nonzero(df['Transfer Quarter'] == 'JAN-MAR')]
activities = ['OCT-DEC', 'APR-JUN', 'JUL-SEP', 'JAN-MAR']
plt.pie(transfer_quarter, labels = activities, autopct = '%1.f%%')
plt.title('Number of Transfer Quarter', fontsize = 15, fontweight = 'bold')
plt.show()
source.2a3e6d03:
#visualize number of sector/theme
plt.figure(figsize = (8,6))
sector = [np.count_nonzero(df['Sector/Theme'] == 'Health'),
          np.count_nonzero(df['Sector/Theme'] == 'Environment/Climate Change'),
          np.count_nonzero(df['Sector/Theme'] == 'Agriculture and Food Security'),
          np.count_nonzero(df['Sector/Theme'] == 'Other'),
          np.count_nonzero(df['Sector/Theme'] == 'Education'),
          np.count_nonzero(df['Sector/Theme'] == 'Natural Disasters')]
activities = ['Health', 'Environment/Climate Change', 'Agriculture and Food Security', 'Other', 'Education',
              'Natural Disasters']
plt.pie(sector, labels = activities, autopct = '%1.f%%')
plt.title('Number of Sector/Theme', fontsize = 15, fontweight = 'bold')
plt.show()
